name: GameFlow [EvasionGames] (Dark!)
description: EvasionGames.com (website for GameFlow, an amazing Unity asset), re-skinned to be darker and easy on the eyes.
additional_info:
v1.5 - [12/18/16] All pages should now be styled appropriately.  If there are issues, please let me know!  ;)

FYI, if you don't like the aqua-colored border around text posts, I put it in as the last style so it's easy to find, and you can adjust it however you'd like from its current setting (border-color: #00fff2).


v1.0 - [12/13/16] Main pages and Forums reskinned.  Have not yet done 'User Control Panel' (editing Profile, etc.) Known issues on those pages with white text over white background - Fix by temporarily disabling style, or select-all to read hidden text.  Further restyling to come shortly.
